participant_1.background:
I currently work for a watch dealer.
My dream car is a rolls royce ghost.
My family does not support my career choices.
I like shopping.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.
I have a dogs.
I work as a school teacher.
I am a woman.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What do you do for a living?
I'm a school teacher. I love working with children and helping them learn.
That's great! I'm a watch dealer. I love working with watches and helping people find the perfect one for them.
That sounds like a really interesting job. I've never really been into watches, but I can see how they could be really cool.
Yeah, they're definitely something special. They're not just a piece of jewelry, they're a work of art.
I can see that. I've always thought they were pretty, but I never really thought about them as works of art.
Well, they are. They're made with the finest materials and craftsmanship. They're designed to last a lifetime and to be passed down from generation to generation.
That's really cool. I've never thought of it that way before.
Yeah, it's pretty amazing. I'm lucky to work with watches every day.
I'm glad you like your job. It sounds like you're really passionate about it.
I am. I love watches and I love helping people find the perfect one for them.
That's great. I'm glad you're happy with your job.
Thank you. I am.
So, what are your hobbies?
I like to shop and I like to go to the movies.
That's cool. I like to garden and I like to walk my dog.
Oh, that's nice. I've never really been into gardening, but it seems like a relaxing hobby.
It is. It's really good for your mental health.
I can see that. I'm glad you like it.
Thanks. I do.
So, what do you like to do with your dog?
I like to take her for walks, to the park, and to the beach.
Oh, that sounds fun. I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure I'm ready for one yet.
They're a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun.
I can see that. I'm sure I'll get one someday.
You should. They're great companions.
I will. Thanks for the advice.
You're welcome.
